pkgmetadata.longdescription: Multiple Imputation Using MICE and Random Forest // Functions to impute using Random Forest under Full Conditional Specifications (Multivariate Imputation by Chained Equations). The CALIBER programme is funded by the Wellcome Trust (086091/Z/08/Z) and the National Institute for Health Research (NIHR) under its Programme Grants for Applied Research programme (RP-PG-0407-10314). The author is supported by a Wellcome Trust Clinical Research Training Fellowship (0938/30/Z/10/Z).
